name: Pink drink
description: Very unknown asian substance, but it's pink and it's a drink. Oh, and it's also a Pokémon. But it's also green

name: Coke
description: Super tasty, the traditional coke taste, but zero sugar and zero calories.

name: Macha Latte
description: Macha Latte is a Japanese green tea latte made with matcha powder, steamed milk, and sweetener. It is a popular drink in Japan and is often served in a tall glass with a lid.

name: Fritz Cola
description: Fritz Cola is a German cola brand. It was first produced in 1905 by the Fritz Kola company in Berlin, Germany. Fritz Cola is a non-alcoholic, non-carbonated soft drink made from a blend of natural ingredients, including sugar, water, and natural flavors.

name: Mizu Mate
description: Mizy Mate is a Brazilian drink, it's a refreshing drink with a hint of mint and a little bit of sugar. It's a great drink for a hot summer day.

name: Vegan Cola
description: Vegan Cola is a natural cola drink made from stevia, a natural sweetener. It is a great alternative to regular cola drinks.

name: Pepsi
description: Pepsi is a carbonated soft drink manufactured by PepsiCo. Originally created and developed in 1893 by Caleb Bradham and introduced as Brad's Drink, it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28, 1898, and then as Pepsi in 1961.

name: Becherovka
description: Becherovka is a Czech herbal liqueur made from 40 herbs and spices. It is produced by the Becherovka Distillery in Prague, Czech Republic.

name: Cold Brew
description: Cold brew is a coffee brewing method that uses room temperature or cold water to extract coffee flavor and caffeine from ground coffee beans. It is typically served over ice or with ice.

name: Black Coffee
description: Black coffee is coffee that is brewed without the addition of milk, sugar, or other sweeteners. It is the most common form of coffee consumed in the world.
